about.title: About
about.description: Delivero is designed to support local delivery drivers with intuitive navigation, efficient route management, and smarter decision-making.
about.feature1: üîç Search locations easily with OpenStreetMap integration
about.feature2: üó∫Ô∏è Visualize real-time location and optimized delivery paths
about.feature3: üìå Save favorite or frequent delivery destinations
about.feature4: üìñ Automatically track your delivery history with timestamps
about.feature5: ‚öôÔ∏è Customize experience with language and theme options
about.extra_info: Whether you're an individual courier or part of a fleet, this app aims to simplify your day-to-day tasks.

how.title: How to Use
how.step1: 1. Tap the search bar to find your delivery destination.
how.step2: 2. Choose a result from the list of suggestions.
how.step3: 3. Confirm saving the destination for future use (optional).
how.step4: 4. Tap the navigation button to start route tracking.
how.step5: 5. The optimal route will appear with distance and path on the map.
how.step6: 6. Once near the destination, you'll receive an arrival notification.
how.step7: 7. View saved destinations and past deliveries in the side menu.
how.tips: Make sure GPS is enabled and permissions are granted.
